name: Hardide® D
description: Hardide®-D is the first successful high performance TSP diamond coating that can withstand the higher temperatures associated with TSP brazing, extreme thermal and mechanical loads encountered when drilling abrasive and hard formations, and aggressive media conditions. We created an innovative new coating for TSP (thermally stable polycrystalline) diamond, a material with diamond hardness that is thermally stable up to 1200°C and can be manufactured into a variety of shapes and sizes.
